title: Goldtrix
text:
Goldtrix were a British house music duo from London, England, consisting of producers Daniel Goldstein and Matrix.  Goldtrix is a play on the artists names: Goldstein + Matrix.
In 2001, they released a cover of Jill Scott's "It's Love (Trippin')", which hit number one on the U.S. Billboard Hot Dance Club Play chart, and No. 6 on the UK Singles Chart in February 2002. Singer Andrea Brown provided lead vocals.
